snippet: Danny Dries, a senior forward on the Ohio State men's hockey team, provides a season recap ahead of the Buckeyes' outdoor game against Michigan on Jan. 15.
abstract: Danny Dries, a senior forward on the Ohio State men's hockey team, provides a season recap ahead of the Buckeyes' outdoor game against Michigan on Jan. 15.
lead_paragraph: As some of you may know, Ohio State has a coming weekend series against the University of Michigan that will be capped off on Jan. 15 with an outdoor game at Progressive Field, the home of the Cleveland Indians, called the Frozen Diamond Faceoff. I'm here to provide you with a season recap so far for our team.

headline.main: Ohio State Diary: Bringing Humor Into Outdoor Game
